nodes.title: Funerary Structure FS2
nodes.body: Funerary structure FS2 (2 m x 2 m) was built on a rock outcrop (29.270΄ / 02.968΄ / 4430 m). It has been reduced to about 1 m in height. However, a superstructure, 60 cm in height, was added to the original base of he structure. This addition is constructed much more crudely than the original cubic tomb and has undergone less subsidence. The structural extension has the appearance of a bhumpabum pa and may have been added for religious reasons.
